main_definition: Based on or influenced by personal feelings, tastes, or opinions rather than external facts or evidence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or based on individual perceptions and experiences
meanings_and_examples.example: The taste of the dish is subjective; what I find delicious may not be appealing to you.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Depending on personal feelings, tastes, or opinions
meanings_and_examples.example: Her viewpoint was purely subjective and did not consider objective facts of the situation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not able to be seen or measured by others; based solely on individual perception
meanings_and_examples.example: The beauty of a painting is highly subjective, as different people may have varying opinions about it.
